website_summaries.verdict: A formula designed to support health challenges specific to large dog breeds.
pros: Addresses challenges specific to large dogs, such as joint pain, digestive problems, and heart problems
Formulated for dogs weighing between 56 and 99 pounds
Omega-3 fatty acids for skin health
Kibble size is optimal for large dogs
Helps with digestive health and coat appearance
cons: Some object to a few of the ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Bark Bark Bark
customer_reviews.text: Give me more. I can't believe I can type. I'm a dog. Wow. Cool. Well now that I am a typing dog, I can bark bark bark say that I like to eat this. My owners sometimes try to give it to me like its a treat. It's not a treat. Pizza crust is a treat. This is my hungry time food. IT's not bacon, but when I am hungry I eat this stuff. And I have a shiny coat and people tell me I'm pretty and look very healthy. And if I can type, this clearly helps make my brain function more better good dog woof woof.
customer_reviews.author: Rob and Mark

customer_reviews.title: Doggy Athlete Food
customer_reviews.text: My lazy 3 year old Shepard Pit girl wouldn't stick with the same food brands, was finicky. Home food would give her the loosies because she was a pound puppy first 2 years, a tummy used to digesting only pellet food. Then we bought Royal Canin. 3 months on, she is a muscular, hard playing, outrunning bully in the dog park, eats her share 2 times a day, no complaining. Takes good big poops 2 times a day, no exceptions. This food is so fine, I am thinking of getting on it myself. Might look expensive, but you need to a give lesser qty than other foods, and a subscription will even out the cost eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Raghav

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Last month it came in perfect shape 5 Stars. Yesterday, the story was different. The box looked like it was invloved in an accident. Full openned, litteraly a disaster. The dog food has a hole in the bag, meaning that it was punctured, so I cannot give it to my dogs because I’m not sure it is fresh. What a dissapointment. The idea of receiving the product every day is good, but the delivery method is questionable. Imagine that something else was within that box. I would have lost it.
customer_reviews.author: Botikario

customer_reviews.title: Piss-poor packaging. Not Happy.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product, it was loose in the box. There was only one piece of tape holding a 35 pound bag of dog food. I’m lucky the tape didn’t break away from the box. However, once I opened the box I found a large gaping hole in the middle of the bag, and half the food rolling around loose in the box. This bag has a seal on it to keep the food fresh. That’s not happening now. Once the food is stale, I’m sure my dog will no longer eat it. If something isn’t done to rectify this problem, I will not be ordering again, as it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. However
customer_reviews.text: The food is a five star dog food. Excellent quality. However, do not purchase through Amazon. I get it from petsmart or petco and my dogs gobble it like theyre about to lose their minds! I get it from Amazon and they won't eat it unless it's slathered in chicken. Something is off about the Amazon bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Vet
customer_reviews.text: I changed food since food I was using was on the 16 foods not to feed your dog The vet recommended this food one dog is doing great on it but the other seems to be allergic. Started chewing on feet and now there is redness , Went from grain free to this so thinking it is the grain causing the problem. Trying Benadryl hoping it will work otherwise might have to change again.
customer_reviews.author: Flourchild

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Not the same.
customer_reviews.text: Dog wouldn’t touch it. The entire bag was waste. Gave it to my friend. His dog wouldn’t touch it. Even after adding cheese. Ate just the cheese, zero dog food. Tried another friend’s dog. Same result. Will buy from the local store from now on. Something is extremely different with the online bags.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Manes

customer_reviews.title: Great for German Shepherds!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a dog food that my European Long Haired German Shepherd can eat without causing her to loose the fur and scratching all of the time. Too much protein and that is what happens and other brands with less protein triggered a yeast infection in her skin and fur. After nearly a year of trying different remedies, this food has made an amazing improvement!! Our dog looks amazing! Great life saver for our sweet dog.
customer_reviews.author: L. Colburn

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been feeding my lab this food over a year, things have been great until this last shipment , she started refusing to eat her food. She would smell the bowl and walk away. We took her to the vet, she had a clean bill of health, the only issue was the food. She continued to sniff it and walk way. I’m not sure why or how but I feel like we got a bad batch. She’s now eating something else and back to her old , Happy, playful self.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Leach

customer_reviews.title: Not healthy for the dog .
customer_reviews.text: My German shepherd is 2.5 and she got sick and been shedding and itching for 3 weeks. I dont know what to do with the 60$ bag of food I just wasted. I'm so disappointed! The vet said this food isn't healthy just expensive.
customer_reviews.author: menashe

customer_reviews.title: Soft Furr Coat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I switched my labradoodle to Royal Canine 3 months ago and it has made a huge difference! Before Royal Canine, my pup had a wirery furr coat and frequent diarrhea. After a few months on royal canine, his diarrhea disappeared and his coat is so soft! He loves the food and I’m so happy we switched! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Good food for my dogs from a reputable company at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I have two Alaskan Malamutes. One is a picky eater, and the other eats everything. Royal Canin is the only dog food my picky eater will eat. I was so thrilled to find it. My overweight dog who eats everything except food for overweight dogs even eats their Care line for overweight dogs. Not her favorite but she does eat it. Good for them food from a reputable company at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: He loves the taste and I love the quality of the food
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my Bernese Mountain Dog this diet since I adopted him 3 years ago. He loves the taste and I love the quality of the food. He has maintained a healthy weight and coat. The added joint support is also a bonus as he is prone to arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Malanous
customer_reviews.text: I cant personally comment on the flavor but my dogs like it. Premium dog food. Fillers like corn in dog food make a dog that farts more, craps more, and has a brittle coat. I've only used Royal Canin for the last 7-8 years. When it is on Amazon, I use a monthly reoccurring order. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kari B.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty?
customer_reviews.text: The review asked me to give 1-5 stars. I didn’t do a taste test, but my dog seems to love it. Then again, he’s a Lab and also eats anything he can put in his mouth. This food does give him gas and I’ll probably be changing food in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Howard

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Food!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to put my dog on Royal Canin Maxi Adult Dry Dog Food because she has a sensitive stomach. She has been on this brand of food (puppy to adult) for the past 8 months. I have tried other brands and this one definitely stands out. It is the best food I have tried for her that doesn't give her any stomach issues. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Happy food.
customer_reviews.text: No more strained back. Not only has Amazon made it easier to buy our dogs favorite dog food but also the price is a deal here. Our Doberman Pincher has been eating Royal Canin Adult Maxi since turning a year and a half. She likes her food but since I feel bad for feeding her the same thing day after day I add a few treats to change it up for her.
customer_reviews.author: DobieMomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bella says yum!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a great buy for a big dog who needs a little careful dietary control. Can't afford to have extra weight on a big dog and can't afford to have a dry food she won't eat. Bella likes this stuff and her svelte beautiful body shows that it's good for her. Her coat glows too. Vet recommended and easier to order from Amazon than go searching the various dog food suppliers for the big bag and if it's in. Easy is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dinkydoright

customer_reviews.title: Great for my guardian
customer_reviews.text: My 120lb dog loves Royal Canin. I love it because it was vet recommended to keep her digestive tract and growth on point. They keep a very clean factory as well. Great dog food!
customer_reviews.author: FS Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: Our 80bl pit/American bulldog mix loves this food. He was eating Merrick before but had to change food due to certain ingredients in the Merrick food he couldn't have high amounts of due to cystine issues(like garbanzo beans for example). He ended up loving this food even more.
customer_reviews.author: Lily F.

customer_reviews.title: Great balanced food for Bernise  mountain dog
customer_reviews.text: We have 100 pound Bernese Mountain dog and he keeps his diet stable and he is very healthy highly recommend this product it does not stay fresh for very long in the large bag highly recommend that you bag it in smaller bags if you don’t use it quickly
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Dogs actually like it.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. More importantly the dogs like it. They eat it easily, are large dogs, and don't have any digestive problems. I get this through the subscribe and save program at Amazon, and would recommend these to those who own large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Selkkan

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Smells pretty good, my dog likes it! The resealable strip is definitely a great idea! Will purchase it again

customer_reviews.title: Great food, price is highway robbery on this site
customer_reviews.text: The only food I feed my dogs. Great quality. No issues. FYI only 45 on chewy dot com..

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog (lab/pb) loves this! She had been eating Science Diet and was unimpressed.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs seem to love it and have been keeping a healthy weight.

customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best I have ever found. My dogs love it and I really do see a difference and their behavior
customer_reviews.author: E. Prine

customer_reviews.text: The only food my 85 lb mastiff/boxer mix has eaten since he came home 6 years ago, and the only food he will eat the rest of his life. The vet is thrilled with his joints and he has remained healthy and energetic.

customer_reviews.text: I have been use this product for while, my 6 Great Pyrenees loved it, but this time, smell strong fish, they did not eat any.. wast money.

customer_reviews.title: our dog loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our Dalmatian can't get enough of this Canin Maxi dry dog food. She loves it and she is a pretty picky eater. She did eat Iams brand and started to not want it, so I tried this Canin Maxi out and she loves it!

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: This food solves my dogs issue with not eating. I'm not sure if he was allergic to the Beneful I was giving him but he gobbles this stuff down. It is a bit more dense I think so I don't give him as much. If you think your dog may have an issue with their current foot give his a shot.

customer_reviews.title: A premium dog food at a reasonable cost

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!

Our 12 year old Golden Retriever has been eating Royan Canin his entire life and has a beautiful coat and very few health problems, which I contribute in part to his diet. I would recommend the Adult Maxi over the larger kibble types (e.g. Royal Canine Golden Retriever) if you have a dog that refuses to chew their food.

customer_reviews.title: Watch the shipping, bag should be vacuumed sealed. If it is not the bag has been compromised.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey But Quality Stuff
customer_reviews.text: My two shepherds love this food. They were eating a cheaper food, but it was hard on their tummies. Now, they're eating better and aren't crop dusting me every five minutes. Two thumbs up.

We will continue to order this. The dogs love it and how great is it to have a 35# bag of dog food delivered to your front door rather than hauling it home from the store!!!

When we were recommended to change his diet to this and exclude protein, he had a significant improvement. We used to buy him Blue Buffalo and it seems he had an allergy to it. We could not be happier with how hes been doing on Royal Canin. I wholeheartedly recommend it.

product_meta.title: Royal Canin Large Breed Adult Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Size:35 lbWith countless dog food options out there that feature formulas focused on ingredients, how do you know what nutrition is right for your pet? No matter how big or small your dog is, Royal Canin has a right-sized diet, made with the precise amount of nutrients needed for every stage of their magnificent long life. Large breed dogs are treasured for being hard working animals and loyal family companions. Whether they’re on the job or playing in the backyard, they lead active lives. Their large bodies benefit from a size-specific diet that can support them with the energy they need, to maintain strong joints, and nourish a healthy skin and coat. Royal Canin Large Adult dry dog food (formerly Maxi Adult) is tailored to support your big dog’s active lifestyle. This exclusive formula contains an optimal balance of high-quality proteins and fiber for optimal energy and digestive health. And because large breed dogs put a lot of stress on their bones and joints, key nutrients are included to help keep them playing. Omega-3 fatty acids, EPA and DHA, help promote your dog’s coat and skin health. Plus, this diet’s exclusive kibble is designed for large jaws, with a palatability that’s sure to please. Add some variety to their bowl with Royal Canin Adult wet dog food. And when your dog reaches 5 years old, switch over to Royal Canin Large Adult 5+ to fight the first signs of aging for a happy, active mature life. With nearly 50 years of scientific research and observation, Royal Canin continues to deliver targeted nutrition to feed every pet’s magnificence. Not satisfied? Then neither are we. Our formulas are 100% satisfaction guaranteed.
feature_bullets: Royal Canin Large Adult dry dog food (formerly Maxi Adult) is precise nutrition specifically made for large dogs 15 months to 5 years old weighing 56–100 pounds
Promotes healthy digestion with easy-to-digest high-quality proteins and a balanced supply of fiber
Helps support bones and joint health in large breed dogs
Nourishes healthy skin and coat with EPA and DHA
Exclusive large-sized kibble design is highly palatable

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
